name: Side-Blobber
description:
Four mighty warriors and magical wizards have bravely fought through many heroic adventures, forever joined together in a tight square formation.

But now they find themselves falling into a sidescrolling world! Can they survive the trials of a new perspective?

CONTROLS

  • A, D, Arrows - Move
  • W, Up, or Z - Jump
  • Spacebar or X - Attack
  • S - Toggle Sound
  • M - Toggle Music

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam using the theme "Joined Together".

Music: Demise, Firststep, LostPlace5, Suspense4 - PeriTune
Tileset: Trapmoor Dungeon - itchabop
